title: Why not give Silver Bolts a charge system?
body:
14/17/20/22/25 second cooldown.
Max charges, 4/5/6/7/8. Starts at 4 on respawn. And 0 at spawn.
You can only use it once per autoattacking 1/1/2/2/3 times on the same target - exposing their weakness.
It becomes an active ability which you have to press to empower your next autoattack on that one target only.

Increases skill required by a bit. She can actually run out of anti-tank rounds.

Thoughts?

replies.body:
where have you heard about a rework?

imo she is perfectly fine as it is and won't be getting  a rework
the problem with a charge system is that it frontloads the damage which increases her dueling potential even more, imo she's perfectly fine from a kit perspective and if she needs a nerf, it will be with ratios/stats

another problem with a charge system is that vayne is that you will be pressing alot of buttons as a vayne player which will acutally make it very difficult to play.


the reason she's become an issue lately is that all the "bullies" are nerfed so that she no longer have that "weak" laning phase which will be fixed with ratio/number changes
Good Idea but I think they should do something like Yasuo's e so the target of silver bolts has like a 3 sec immunity to I guess after the 3 hits
naaaaa. but apparently shes getting a rework. probably not before poppy and taric though, which i read somewhere. she might get nerfed if shes played a lot at worlds
